website_summaries.verdict: The price is right for this unique light, but as there are other options that offer notably better performance for a few dollars more, you may want to shop around.
pros: The Philips SlimStyle BR30 is one of the most affordable LED floodlights you'll find, making it a great value for simple recessed lighting setups
cons: Like its predecessor, the SlimStyle flickers and buzzes when used with a dimmer switch
It also isn't as bright or as efficient as some of its competitors

customer_reviews.title: Rich in color, wild styling
customer_reviews.text: LED bulbs allow for some rather unconventional shapes and Philips seems to like experimenting with designs. This BR30 equivalent is no exception. I tried another brand's BR30 bulb and was really disappointed that it cause significant FM radio interference. Thankfully, the Philips bulb does not. This is a High CRI bulb and it seems rich in color. Subjectively, no formal testing, the reds look richer than the other brand's bulb. I bought this for my parents kitchen where having foods look rich in color, rather than drab, is always nice.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Vandergriff

customer_reviews.title: Works Properly with Lutron Caseta Dimmer
customer_reviews.text: Fine light. I'm mainly writing this to let people know this works properly with the Lutron Caseta dimmer. The Costco brand don't turn off because of the way the Caseta dimmers work, but this one works fine. The light is fine, no issue , efficient, decent light color.
customer_reviews.author: TomK1

customer_reviews.title: Great LEDs, bought some Sylvania's from Lowes at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great LEDs, bought some Sylvania's from Lowes at the same time, both are excellent and about the same price. I notice that these are brighter, which is good, but both are very bright when compared to the standard bulbs I was replacing. I did one room in these and another in the Sylvania's. I would likely buy the Sylvania's again over these, but I have only had both for 2 weeks, so time will tell which last longer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Skube

customer_reviews.title: Best price on indoor LED floods
customer_reviews.text: These were the only style that would fit into the ceiling sockets. Most LED floodlights have a bulge that prevented them from fully seating into the recessed sockets. The straight neck of these mean they fit where every other bulb failed. If you have an application that closely hugs the shape of your incandescent or halogen bulbs, this may be the bulb for you. At this price they are worth replacing all your interior floods.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ashimine

customer_reviews.title: Good quality LED bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Good quality LED bulbs, nice quality light. I've been replacing CFLs with Philips LED bulbs slowly over the last eight years or so. The Philips LEDs that I first put in eight years or so back are still going strong, and they get used every day. Glad that the prices are finally coming down, but I think even the price I paid for them at the beginning is probably worth it in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Realon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I replaced 65W incandescent bulbs with these. I installed them into pod lights. The color and brightness is almost identical to the previous lights. These lights are BR30 which are smaller than my previous lights and therefore leave a little space around the bulb. The lights start immediately and look very natural. I would buy them again. *Update - its been over a year with daily use and the bulbs are going strong.
customer_reviews.author: wiseguy

customer_reviews.title: Unlike some other brands [TCP in particular] these Philips work ...
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some other brands [TCP in particular] these Philips work well as replacements for incandescent or CFL BR30s with both my Lutron and older style rotary Triac dimmers designed for incandescent bulbs. Their flat-faced appearance gives them a more modern look than the standard BR30 LED replacement, but the performance is indistinguishable. Smooth dimming, no flickering, no buzzing.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Maeder

customer_reviews.title: Thus far they've been working great, I've purchased about 20 and not a single ...
customer_reviews.text: These are much lighter weight than the other LED bulbs I've purchased. Thus far they've been working great, I've purchased about 20 and not a single problem. (As a comparison, I purchased about 20 LED bulbs from a different manufacturer and 2 out of the 20 didn't work.) Definitely buying more of the Philips SlimStyle for the rest of the house.
customer_reviews.author: BizzyBee

customer_reviews.title: Stop searching, buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: Buy this light bulb. Seriously, if you stumbled across my review you were in the realm to try out new LED technologies and have been disappointed with the results from other bulbs. This one dims perfectly and does not have the harshness of other LED bulbs. It does warm light wonderfully. My quest for cam light replacement found this gem. I am so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great bulb that works well in recessed lighting situations
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the recessed lighting in my kitchen. Be careful of the daylight ones. They will turn on the sun in whatever room they are placed. The dimmable feature doesn't seem to want to turn on till about half way through the dimmer switch rotation. After its on, they do fine and will dim fairly low. Just a minor annoyance at best.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for incandescent bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match for warm incandescent. I've been trying to shift the entire house to LEDs but my wife is very picky about her bulbs and color temperature. These are beautiful, don't hum, and bottom line - she never noticed that I swapped them out. Win win.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: I have 12 of these bulbs. They are much ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 12 of these bulbs. They are much less expensive than retro fitting all my recessed lights. Made a huge difference with my electric usage.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S.

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for our canned lights in the basement
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our canned lights in the basement. Long neck and flat light gives no issues for clearance on the fixture. Very bright and very large flood area. Nailed it!
customer_reviews.author: BlueArcher

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these lights
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these lights. They dim great, I have bought multiple times, and would buy many again. Love how low they dim, and would recommend to anyone in the market for a solid LED.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Maloney

customer_reviews.title: love these for all my recessed lighting, don't even get warm. Great color lighting too!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bulbs. I have them in daylight which is like the color of outdoors. I use them in all of my recessed lighting. I love that they are plastic too, so they are simple to get up with the long arm and suction cup to my 24 foot ceilings. Will buy again if I outlive them! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jillian222

customer_reviews.title: Only for deep cans
customer_reviews.text: If you have the shallower style cans where the "dome" of the bulb is exposed and bubbles out of the fixture, do NOT get these lights. Technically, they are nice bulbs but if you have the shallow cans they will look stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Nolen

customer_reviews.title: Ok light, good color (daylight)
customer_reviews.text: Ok light, good color (daylight). Really cheap for my purposes in photography. All plastic. I drop it several times and it still works fine. Feels cheap but works grate.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Cossio Torres

customer_reviews.title: The light is perfect in every other way
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the color of the light. Daylight looks artificial to me. But that's just my preference. The light is perfect in every other way. It's certainly bright. Nice and flush in recessed lights. I just prefer a warmer light.
customer_reviews.author: Jelewis

customer_reviews.title: Buzzing Is Annoying
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs all work fine. They give off a nice warm light. It appears to produce the stated lumens. The problem is that a couple of the bulbs buzz which did not happen with the G7 and TCP bulbs I purchased at the same time. I bought all 3 brands to see which one I like best. All give off a warm light and plenty of light for a bedroom just the buzzing is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: All plastic construction, light is warm
customer_reviews.text: All plastic, no fragile glass in construction. So it is good for high ceiling recessed lights, don't have to worry about change it often and fall into pieces when change it with a pole. The light is warn yellowish, slightly brighter than a 65W bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great price at the time.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and so far long lasting. LEDs have come down in price but at the time these were an exceptional value
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This light is a cold white with a slight blue ...
customer_reviews.text: This light is a cold white with a slight blue to it. While its not an over powering blue but it is very noticeable that this is not pure white. It also creates a strong focus light but that also makes the shadows harder and darker than a normal light. The slight blue didn't blend well with my other lights so I moved it in to the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Tb64

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: Ive had these for months now and they work fine nice lighting
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Firesheets

customer_reviews.title: Natural white color, works well in kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well. The color is natural white which we is what wanted for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: JYL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: outstanding bulbs, very bright daylight definitely worth the money and use very little electricity
customer_reviews.author: Ron Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Real bright light! Feels like the sun!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! So bright! Real sunlight feel! Little expensive still, I can get something similar at Sams club! LED is the way to go! Instant bright light!
customer_reviews.author: BecaLynn

customer_reviews.title: Great light bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Great light bulbs. I like that they're plastic and thus unbreakable. Provide a good amount of light and really help to save energy.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Great lights and at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great lights and at a good price. They are a little blue at lower dimming levels as compared to some of the other newer models out there.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product worked but the shape is a little odd compared ...
customer_reviews.text: Product worked but the shape is a little odd compared to traditional bulbs and other LED's for in ceiling lights
customer_reviews.author: Rob DC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome recessed lighting option
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome recessed lighting option. I've been using them for 3 weeks and they work like a charm, even with a Lutron Maestro dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Another ShopperTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Slim means it can fit into anything, but it's long so it might be sticking out
customer_reviews.text: Bright and slim so it fits into my small ceiling fixture
customer_reviews.author: AKJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great energy efficient bulb. I plan on ordering them for all of my living areas.
customer_reviews.author: Percy L.

customer_reviews.title: So far they seem to be a great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bright and low power, these fit perfectly into the spotlight rail fixtures in our house. So far they seem to be a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just installed em. works with my dimmable switch. lets see how they do over time
customer_reviews.author: JustAnotherReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement lamp
customer_reviews.text: Good quality light, kicks in a split-second moment after my other lights on the same dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: DW SJ

customer_reviews.title: Love these bulbs - nice clean white and instant on
customer_reviews.text: Love these bulbs - nice clean white and instant on, unlike the CFLs I was using. Amazon service was fast and flawless as always.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cormack

customer_reviews.title: great white light unlike many led bulbs these bulbs are ...
customer_reviews.text: great white light unlike many led bulbs these bulbs are lite in weight no danger of light fixture falling from ceiling
customer_reviews.author: MRL

customer_reviews.title: These are the best LED lamps I have bought so far
customer_reviews.text: These are the best LED lamps I have bought so far. Very natural light color and dimmable. You can actually dim them down really low too.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Schafleitner

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the kind of light it give off
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. I don't like the kind of light it give off.
customer_reviews.author: K Grif

customer_reviews.title: Bright and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Provides excellent light, instant on, and low power consumption with incredible light output! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris X

customer_reviews.title: Looks great & easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my old light fixtures. Easy to screw in too!
customer_reviews.author: DLJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Working as expected
customer_reviews.text: till now good ... Working as expected ... Will update accordingly...
customer_reviews.author: Mizba

customer_reviews.title: SAVE $$$ with these LED's for Ur HOME !!!!
customer_reviews.text: These LED's are great !!!!! my bill is so low now !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ainsley Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can finally see in my bathroom. fills the recessed light fixture tight.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B. Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Made my office workable!!
customer_reviews.text: Bright and perfect for my work space (converted bedroom with one window)
customer_reviews.author: ohhimark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is really nice now in my kitchen light like it's always daylight.
customer_reviews.author: Oleuser

customer_reviews.title: Good chance the bulb will flicker ...
customer_reviews.text: I did an 'ask a question' after I bought the bulb and asked who out there in Amazonland had issues with the bulb flickering. Over half of the replies had issues. Now I have 4 of these, wanted to replace all the lights in my kitchen, guess I will go back to halogen lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Try another brand
customer_reviews.text: These are a very harsh white and somewhat difficult to get used to. They also tend to flash, dim and blink after they are on for awhil which is very distracting.
customer_reviews.author: PetDoc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for standard bulbs. Matches warm white (NOT blueish) color temp.
customer_reviews.author: T. H. Matheu

product_meta.title: Philips SlimStyle 9.5 watt (65W Equivalent) Soft White (2700K) BR30 Dimmable LED Light Bulb
product_meta.description: Size:1 Pack| Style:65 Watt Equivalent Soft WhiteThis Philips 65 Watt equivalent SlimStyle BR30 consumes 9.5 watts of energy, saving you up to 152.63 dollar in energy costs over the life of the bulb. The SlimStyle household LED not only uses less energy than traditional light sources, but also comes at an irresistible price. Fully dimmable, it provides a soft, comfortable light. This BR30 is ideal for track lighting and recessed fixtures throughout your home - perfect for living rooms, dining rooms, hallways and kitchens. Philips SlimStyle LED light bulbs have a low wattage that uses between 80 and 83 percent less energy than incandescent light bulbs, but with the same light quality. This modern, efficient LED alternative to incandescent will bring you savings for years to come.
feature_bullets: This Philips 65 Watt equivalent SlimStyle BR30 consumes 9.5 watts of energy, saving you up to 152.63 Dollar in energy costs
New sleek, flat design is ideal for use in track light and recessed fixtures in your home
Extra long lifetime of 22.8 years - reduces the hassle of frequent replacement
Safe for the environment and your home - durable design and mercury-free
Dimmable and provides a soft, comfortable light

specifications.Warranty Description: 3 year warranty, see package for details.
